mapper.sql: dicid, name, memo, sort, parent_id, display, disabled, code
mapper.select:
select
from jt_dictionary where parent_id = #{parent_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and display = 1
and display = 0
order by parent_id,sort

select
from jt_dictionary where display > -1 order by parent_id,sort
mapper.insert: insert into jt_dictionary (dicid, name, memo, sort, parent_id, display, disabled, code) values (#{dicid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parent_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{display,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{disabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

dicid,

update jt_dictionary
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{parent_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
display = #{display,jdbcType=INTEGER},
disabled = #{disabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where dicid = #{dicid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
